mapper.select: SELECT seq, section_seq, nick_nm, use_cnt, modify_ymdt, stat, ( SELECT seq FROM secret_room_history WHERE secret_room_seq = #{secretRoomSequene} ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS current_history_seq FROM secret_room WHERE seq = #{secretRoomSequene}
mapper.update: UPDATE secret_room SET stat = 'USE' , use_cnt = use_cnt + 1, modify_ymdt = NOW() WHERE seq = #{secretRoomSequene} AND stat = 'UNUSE'
UPDATE secret_room SET stat = 'UNUSE' , modify_ymdt = NOW() WHERE seq = #{secretRoomSequene}
